General.Name: Medicalg
General.Description: Medicalgorithmics S.A. provides cardiac diagnostic solutions in Poland, the United States, and internationally. It offers PocketECG, a diagnostic solution for the diagnosis of arrhythmia that provides disclosure ECG signal, complete data, analysis, and comprehensive reporting; and PocketECG IV, a multichannel device for diagnostics and monitoring arrhythmias and ECG irregularities. The company is also developing ECG TechBot, a software using a set of algorithms for automatic analysis and interpretation of the ECG signal; PatchECG, a device enabling one-channel offline monitoring; and NextGen, a software version for PocketECG. In addition, it offers information technology, ECG monitoring, and scientific research and development services; and manufactures electrical equipment for medicines. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Warsaw, Poland.
